attributes.additional_details: The conservative party have forced the general public to act, two new leader in one year and we don't get a choice. They have already destroyed peoples hopes of owning homes in the near future and made countless u-turns on policies made mere weeks ago, this country needs a general election so the UK people can decide who leads this country.
attributes.background: Call a general election in the next few months so the British people can decide who runs the country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
